translations: n.大蟒；括约肌；使压缩之物

sentences.sentence: Unconsciously, an angry of Harry makes Dudley separate from a boa constrictor.
sentences.translation: 不知不觉中，愤怒的哈利把达力和一条蟒蛇分开了。

sentences.sentence: All species have a two-part Latin name, such as Boa constrictor or Homo sapiens.
sentences.translation: 所有物种的名字都由两部分拉丁文组成，像蟒蛇（Boa constrictor）或智人（Homo sapiens）。

sentences.sentence: Once, I did a cartoon of a boa constrictor marked Capital swallowing a rabbit marked Labour.
sentences.translation: 有一次，我画了幅漫画，一条标着“资本”的大蟒蛇正在吞下一只标着“劳工”的兔子。
